item.title: first R post
item.description: Adding some other text. 1+1 ## [1] 2 x_plus_one <- function(x) { return(x+1) } x_plus_one ## function(x) { ## return(x+1) ## } number_convert <- function(x) { return(as.character(x)) } number_convert("9") ## [1] "9" print("Hello") ## [1] "Hello" print("hello")
